entry.data:
CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
EAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 60

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
